meanings.definition: A type of fine woolen cloth.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful kerseymere scarf to keep warm in the winter.
meanings.sent2: The tailor used kerseymere to make a luxurious coat for the customer.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with a piece of kerseymere, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as soft and comforting as a kerseymere blanket on a chilly night.
meanings.sent5: The rich colors of the kerseymere fabric stood out among the other materials in the store.

meanings.definition: A garment made from kerseymere fabric.
meanings.sent1: He proudly showed off his new kerseymere jacket to his friends.
meanings.sent2: The elegant dress was crafted from the finest kerseymere available.
meanings.sent3: She pretended to be a royal queen, draped in her kerseymere cape.
meanings.sent4: The kerseymere coat wrapped around her like a protective shield against the cold.
meanings.sent5: The touch of the kerseymere garment against her skin was pure comfort.
